Record of New Features and Bug Fixes For QN01Box
06-07-28
Added optional computation of the Hessian argument to QuasiNewton01Box .
06-05-04
Fix some standard compliance problems so that QN01Box builds under gcc 4.1.0 (Red Hat 4.1.0-3).
05-12-12
Change ./Build script to make debug, instead of optimized, version of library and tests. Add *.o and *.a to remove list in ./CleanQN01Box script. Add error recovery in QuadBox in the case where Next fails.
05-12-08
Separate the routine that ensure positive definite matrices PositiveMatrix from the routine that computes the Bfgs update.
05-12-07
The makefiles for the lib and Test directories were not properly using the new COMPILE_FLAGS configure option. This has been fixed. The QuadBox function was return an error message when the maximum number of iterations was reached instead of returning ok together with how accurate an answer it was able to achieve. This has been fixed.
05-12-05
Add the Bennet5
test case in the file Test/NLRegression.cpp. This is a very ill-conditioned problem that only seems to pass when one starts at the solution.
Add the value dxMax to tracing output.
Change error criteria in subproblem to be relative to both current gradient and current Hessian approximation.
Use a fixed minimum step size in Bfgs of 1e-5 (so that very small steps do not cause large round off errors).
Add compiler flags to list of configure options during Install .
05-11-21
The calling sequence to QuadBox has changed to have both an input and output error criteria value.
05-11-15
The calling sequence to QuasiNewton01Box has been changed. In particular, a new argument called norm has been added. This allows for different various convergence criteria. The meaning of QuadMax has been changed. In addition, some of the norms in the level = 1 tracing have also been changed (to be the controlled by norm).
05-11-14
The routine QuadFixed was no longer being used and has been removed (it was long ago replaced by QuadBox ). Add the ScaleProjGrad and SumAbs utilities. Use alphabetical order for the test cases in Test/RunTest. Change the QuadMax argument to QuasiNewton01Box to mean maximum number of iterations per subproblem (instead of total maximum).
05-10-25
The routine LinkErrorHandler was added so that the user could replace the default QN01Box error handler.
05-10-28
A summary message was added at the end of the Test/RunTest program (which is run during installation ).
